item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: cyanidetechnologies
item.content:encoded:
Working towards a brighter South Africa

South African Services

SERVICES

Who are we

We are SA Core

We are a non-profit organization focused on bringing South African services closer to South Africans.

Mission statement

Often, as South African's we find ourselves at a crossroads in our ability to use the services available to us. Our mission is to make South African services as accessible as possible with simply the click of a button.

SERVICES

About Us

For the love of...

South Africa

Let us work together to make South Africa the place that we've envisioned it to be. Lets empower ourselves through making use of the services we have available.

item.title: Why choose me
item.dc:creator: cyanidetechnologies
item.content:encoded:
Your rights

Your Services

Select a service...

South African Police Service

The mission of SAPS is to prevent and combat anything that may threaten the safety and security of any community

Fire and Rescue Service Department

The Fire and Rescue Service Department extends its work to all types of fires, medical emergencies, incidents, and hazardous material emergencies

Medical Service

Medical treatment, surgery, diagnostics, chiropractic, dental, hospital care, nursing, and ambulances are all included as well as crutches, prosthetic appliances, braces, and supports

Law Enforcement

Law enforcement services in South Africa are the responsibility of the Ministry of Police

Metropolitan Police

Metro police direct traffic in the event of an accident, breakdown, spillage, or when lights are out of order

Childline

These services are accessible 24 hours to children and adults with concerns about children and enable them to contact someone in emergencies

Crime Stop

This call center can be contacted to anonymously report criminal activities

Gender Based Violence Hotline

The Gender-Based Violence Hotline aims to protect victims and survivors, prevent gender-based violence, develop a human rights culture and develop an initiative addressing gender-based violence

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: cyanidetechnologies
item.content:encoded:
Services

South Arican Police Service

Contact Us

Head office: +27 12 393 1000

For emergencies, call 10111

Fire and Rescue Service Department

Contact Us
Fire emergencies - Landline: 107
Cellphone : 021 480 7700
Fire safety inspectorate inquiries: 021 590 1971
General inquiries: 021 590 1702

Melomed Hospital

Contact Us
Head office: +27 21 699 0950
Melomed Bellville: +27 21 948 8131
Melomed Claremont: + 27 21 683 0540
MelomedGatesville: +27 21637 8100
Melomed Mitchells Plain: +27 21 392 3126
Melomed Richards Bay: +27 35 791 5300
Melomed Tokai: +27 21 764 7500
Melomed 24: 0800 786 000

Law Enforcement

Contact Us
Traffic fine enquiries: 0860 103 089
General enquiries: 021 596 1999
Chief Rudolf Wiltshire: 021 444 4259
Cable busters: 0800 225 669
Land invasion: 0800 225 669
Informal trading unit: 021 596 1999

Metropolitan Police

Contact Us
General enquiries: 021 427 5126
Emergency contacts: 021 480 7700
Emergency telephone from a landline: 107
Contact Us
Telephone: +27 31 201 2059
Childline Western Cape
Telephone: +27 21 762 8198

Crime Stop

Contact Us
Telephone: 086 001 0111

Gender-Based Violence

Contact Us
Telephone: 0800 428 428

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: kiarlon
item.content:encoded:
SOUTH AFRICAN SERVICES

#1

Who are we

We are SA Core

We are a non-profit organization focused on bringing South African services closer to South Africans.

Mission statement

Often, as South African's we find ourselves at a crossroads in our ability to use the services available to us. Our mission is to make South African services as accessible as possible with simply the click of a button.

SERVICES

For the love of

South Africa

Let us work together to make South Africa the place that we've envisioned it to be. Lets empower ourselves through making use of the services we have available.
